snippet.title: Outbreak: Epidemic Xbox One Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Return to the world of survival horror with Outbreak: Epidemic, the brand new adventure from Dead Drop Studios. Fight through the Campaign, survive the wave-based Onslaught Mode and experience all new challenges in the Experiments Mode. Pick your survivor, level them up and take on greater challenges. You have one life - make it count!
